author: KPATT
text:
You CS support with getting in contact with a representative about an issue I have with a purchase I made of some NB Sneakers is absolutely horrible. It pisses me off that u all told my money very quick. But when I all I need to do is exchange my sneakers for a smaller size. You all have made that process so hard.At this point of m going to cancel and void the purchase for a complete refund. 

Thx 
Kent P.
title: You CS support with getting in contact…

author: Brenda
text: My Marina Blue High Jordan 1s have two creases in the toe. Vertical creases. Not cool. Im sure yall saw that when you verified them. Super disappointed
title: Vertical creases in toe of shoe

author: Lyndsay
text: Order is delayed and there is no information when I press to view my order so I cannot track it

author: Steph H
text: It took over a week (after I had already paid) to find out that the seller didn’t even have the shoes I ordered!! I don’t think sellers should be allowed to post something unless it’s CONFIRMED that they have the stock they are trying to sell. This website wasted so much of my time and I definitely won’t be using them again.
title: Absolute time suck

author: minato
text: want me to do a review when I still don't even have my things

author: Julie
text: Ordered 2 pairs of shoes 11.5 in mens and the sent me the wrong size … they sent me 11.5 in womens. Trying to get them returned or exchanged is a total pain! I will never buy from them again! Terrible terrible experience!
title: Ordered 2 pairs of shoes both were…

author: Debra A
text: too many added on expenses!!!
title: too many added on expenses!!!

author: Noah
text: The condition of the box was awful. Looked like two kids played catch with it before it was shipped. Will never buy anything on stock X again.
title: The condition of the box was awful

author: Gel
text:
I was so excited when I bought this sweater, but when I received it I was quite bummed out. The print is gorgeous, I love my girl snoh, but the sweater itself is too thick and not even soft on the inside and the color looks faded like it’s been washed 20 times.
I bought other sweaters AT Coachella that feel so much better, so I’m bummed I spent as much as I did on this.
title: Love snoh. But not the sweater.

author: Andy
text: I ordered my item on April 18th and to this day it's still hasn't even shipped to StockX for verification
title: I ordered my item on April 18th

text: I ordered some safari dunks that were NOT authentic so StockX canceled my order and I still haven’t received my refund.

author: GB
text: After 4 weeks my shoes has not been shipped to me, delay delay delay…. Bad experience, bad communication, but at the end I received a complete refund.

author: customer
text: I got no information on the delay I got no refund for the shipping. The item is still late it is supposed to be a graduation present. This is so unprofessional. This is why I prefer using Grailed or other application. I doubt if this isn’t resolved well if I will use stocks in the future.
title: I got no information on the delay I got…

text: The hat ordered, was professionaly cleaned and u could see the stain marks , there was no tagged attached, the item was NOT BRAND NEW,  very poor customer service, still haven't gotten a reply about my other hat and hasn't even been shipped the past 2 weeks. WHATA RE YOU DOING MAN ?

author: Neli
text: this is my first time buying from stockx. i bought adidas forum 84 lows for $150 and then a week later they told me the seller didn’t have them. How did they have them when i paid and then all of a sudden they run out? idk probably not shopping on stockx again
title: Quick to take my money but then run out of stock?
